name: Dangerous Frightfur Nightmary
desc:
1 “Edge Imp” monster + 2 “Fluffal” monsters
Gains 300 ATK for each Fairy and Fiend monsters in your GY during your turn. When this Fusion Summoned card destroys a monster by battle: You can send a number of “Frightfur”, “Fluffal”, and/or “Edge Imp” monsters from your Deck to the GY, equal to the Level of the destroyed monster. When an opponent's card effect that targets this card on the field is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 “Frightfur” monster from your Extra Deck; negate that activation.
